LanguageData.HMI_showTextileInfo_ToolTip: Enables/disables stats of the selected fabric or leather for building beds.
LanguageData.HMI_showApparelArmorStats_ToolTip: Enables/disables stats of the selected armor against sharp and blunt damage.
LanguageData.HMI_showWorkTableSpeedFactor_ToolTip: Enables/disables a speed factor of the selected workbench.
LanguageData.HMI_showBedStats_ToolTip: Enables/disables stats of the selected bed.
LanguageData.HMI_showColonistSuppression_ToolTip: Enables/disables colonist supperssion stats. May not work, if suppression is disabled in CombatExtended mod options.
LanguageData.HMI_showEnemySuppression_ToolTip: Enables/disables enemy supperssion stats. May not work, if suppression is disabled in CombatExtended mod options.
